column8: Brave and beautiful, the mighty red kite can stay in the air for many hours with hardly a beat of its wings so I had to draw him in flight. With a wingspan of nearly two metres (about five-and-a-half-feet) these magnificent creatures have brought themselves from the brink of extinction over the past 30 years, so they are worthy of admiration.  All hail the glorious red kite. Wear this Red Kite T-shirt and show your admiration for this incredible creature.
